thread.title: VTech's Developmental Learning Toys Honored with PAL Awards (Vtech Holdings Limited)
thread.title_full: VTech's Developmental Learning Toys Honored with PAL Awards (Vtech Holdings Limited) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: VTech's Developmental Learning Toys Honored with PAL Awards (Vtech Holdings Limited)
text: ( Source : Vtech Holdings Limited ) Chicago - Today VTech announced three products received prestigious Play Advances Language ( PAL ) Awards for toys that enrich speech and language developmental skills and keep children engaged as they learn.
